ygData.subject: Re: Reinforcements are here!

Scavenger:


Scavenger, seeing RebelYell via a mirror, he sped backwards, but the 
grenade sent him flipping, crashing to the ground.  He transformed to 
robot mode with his chain gun ready.

(Sorry about how kind of extremely cheap this is, I got cut off after 
writing it, and when that happens I don't enjoy rewriting it)
